field.label: Enable Category Robots
field.comment:
Enable robots meta tag management for categories and their products
How to Use (v2.0)
Category Robots Settings:
1. Go to Catalog > Categories
2. Edit any category and expand Search Engine Optimization section
3. Configure the following fields:
  • Robots Meta Tag Directives - Select multiple directives to control category page indexing
  • Apply Robots to Category Products - Enable to apply robots settings to products in this category
  • Robots Directives for Category Products - Select directives for products (shown when toggle is enabled)

Available Directives:
  • Basic Indexing: index, noindex, follow, nofollow, all, none
  • Content Control: noarchive, nosnippet, notranslate, noimageindex
  • Advanced: max-snippet, max-image-preview, max-video-preview
Special Options:
  • Use Default - Leave empty to use system default settings
  • Use Category Robots - Products inherit category's directives

Example: Warehouse Deals Category
To prevent indexing of Warehouse Deals category and its products:
1. Select NOINDEX and NOFOLLOW directives for Robots Meta Tag
2. Enable Apply Robots to Category Products
3. Select Use Category Robots or choose specific directives for products

Note: You can select multiple directives to create custom combinations (e.g., NOINDEX + FOLLOW + NOARCHIVE)
